entries.headline: Mesmerizing Distraction
entries.content:
It is easy to be mesmerized by the beauty of this place, by the natural wonders that surround us at every turn.

But we must never forget exactly what we are trying to achieve here -and the inherent dangers that await us if indeed the Project is successful.

entries.headline: Phase 1: Tragic Monument
entries.content:
These massive skeletons belong to creatures that are no longer found on the planetâ€™s surface. Undoubtedly, they existed during the Project's first phase.

Although their rise and subsequent extinction were inevitable, I still find it tragic that such magnificent beasts were not able to survive.
